title: register
subject: Email Registration
template: Hi {{event.user}}newchar			Thank you for registering with {{event.sitename}}! .			Click    the blue link below to get started!     			  {{event.activeurl}}			   			Thank younewchar

title: bid_submitted
subject: Your Bid was Submitted Succesffully
template: {{event.sitename}}  Hi {{event.user}}  Your ${{event.amount}} bid submitted successfully for {{event.title}}.We will notify you if you become a winner.Thank younewchar

title: project_posted
subject: New Product is Added
template: Hi {{event.userName}}newcharA new product has been posted. Click on this link {{event.url}} for more details.Thanksnewchar

title: winner_buyer
subject: You are the winner !
template: {{event.sitename}}  Hinewchar {{event.fname}} {{event.tname}}>Congratulationsnewchar You’re the winning bidder!Item Title: {{event.title}}Item Price:${{event.price}}Item URL: {{event.url}}For your conveniencenewchar here is the seller's payment policy:We accept all major credit cardsnewchar Paypalnewchar and bank wires.Unless otherwise specified by the payment policy abovenewchar you must pay for the item within 72 hours to avoid a cancellation of your purchase.Terms of SaleAll sales are FINAL. Product is sold AS ISnewchar WHERE IS.Buyer is responsible for all taxesnewchar dutiesnewchar loading and freight charges.Seller offers no warranties direct or implied from manufacturer or otherwise.Title transfers from Seller to Buyer upon release to Buyer logistics provider at pick up.Buyer (or Buyer’s logistics provider) must confirm quantity and condition at pick up. Upon release of product to the Buyer and removed from Seller’s locationnewchar there will be no adjustments based on quantity or condition.What's Next After Payment?Seller will receive an email from ChemExchange upon receipt of Buyer payment. Seller will be instructed to email Buyer a pick-up/order number for issuance of product. If you haven't heard from the Seller within 72 hoursnewchar please contact us at support@chemexchange.com.Contact SellerThank younewchar{{event.sitename}}

title: watchlist_added
subject: Item Successfully Added to your Watchlist
template: Hi {{event.user}}			 {{event.title}} product added to your Watchlist.			Thank younewchar

title: item_sold
subject: Your Item Sold
template: Hi {{event.user}}			Your Item {{event.title}} has sold successfully!			Item Title : {{event.title}}			Item Price : ${{event.price}}			Item  Url : {{event.url}}			Item  qty : {{event.qty}}			Buyer Name : {{event.bname}}			Buyer Email : {{event.bemail}}			Buyer Phone : {{event.bphone}}			What's Next?			You will receive an email from {{event.sitename}} upon receipt of Buyer’s payment. Please provide a pick-up/order number to the Buyer upon receipt of this email. If you haven't heard from the Buyer within 72 hoursnewchar please contact us at support@chemexchange.com.						Thank younewchar

title: package_bought
subject: Package Bought Successfully!
template: <meta content="text/html; charset=UTF-8" http-equiv="Content-Type">  <title>{{event.sitename}}</title>  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-widthnewchar initial-scale=1.0"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="600"><tbody><tr><td class="wysiwyg-tmp-selected-cell"><div style="margin:20px 20px;font-size:15px;font-weight:bold;width:600px;font-family:Arialnewchar Helveticanewchar sans-serif;color:#000;">Hi {{event.user}}</div><div style="margin:20px 20px;font-size:13px;font-weight:bold;font-family:Arialnewchar Helveticanewchar sans-serif;color:#000;">You bought package succesfully</div><div style="margin:20px 20px;font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;width:600px;font-family:Arialnewchar Helveticanewchar sans-serif;color:#000;">Package Price : ${{event.price}}</div><div style="margin:20px 20px;font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;width:600px;font-family:Arialnewchar Helveticanewchar sans-serif;color:#000;">Thank younewchar<br><br><img src="{{event.siteurl}}/images/logoc.png" alt="" width="160"></div></td></tr></tbody></table>
